title: Aaha Kaadhal Lyrics Moondru Per Moondru Kadhal Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Aaha Kaadhal
Singers: Nandini Erikar
Music : Yuvan Shankar Raja
Lyrics : Na Muthu Kumar
Movie: Moondru Per Moondru Kadhal

Other Song Lyrics
Kaadhal Endhan Kaadhal Unakaagave Uyir Vazhkiren Aaha Kadhal Konji
Mazhai Mazhai Padapadakudhu Manamey
Stop the Paatu
Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
Aaha Kaadhal Konji konji Pesudhe
Aalai miratti kallathanam kaatudhey
orey perai udhadugal solkindradhey
adhey peril en peyar serkindradhey
Vinaa thaazhlil vetridam thindaadhey
kadhal  ketkum  kelviyaa ?

Aaha Kaadhal Konji konji Pesudhe
Aalai miratti kallathanam kaatudhey

Nadhiyil vizhum ilai indha kadhalaa
Karayai thoda ithanai modhalaa
vilundhadhu naanaa?
ezhundhiduvenaa ?
ezhundhidum podhum vilundhiduvenaa!!

Unnai paarpadhai naanariyen
unnai paarkiren verraiyen
ennudan neeyaa ?
unnudan naanaa ?
naaney neeyaa ?
neeye naanaa ?
idhu enna aanandhamo
dhinam dhinam sugam sugam.

Aaha Kaadhal Konji konji Pesudhe
Aalai miratti kallathanam kaatudhey

Yedhuvo ennai unnidam eerthadhu
adhudhaan unnai ennidam serthadhu
thozhaindhadhu naanaa ?
kidaithiduvenaa ?
Kidaithidum podhum thozhaindhiduvenaa ?

pengal manam oru oonjal illai
oonjal thannaal asaivadhillai
ilupadhu neeyaa ?
varuvadhu naanaa ?
dhisai ariyaadhu thirumbiduvenaa ?
kadhalin oonjalil asaivadhu sugam sugam .

Aaha Kaadhal Konji konji Pesudhe
Aalai miratti kallathanam kaatudhey
orey perai udhadugal solkindradhey
adhey peril en peyar serkindradhey
Vinaa thaazhlil vetridam thindaadhey
kadhal  ketkum  kelviyaa ?..

aaha kadhal ..
aalai miratti ... English Translation
I tried my best :)
